an9.10:1: "Navayime, bhikkhave, puggalā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa. Katame nava? Arahā, arahattāya paṭipanno, anāgāmī, anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, sakadāgāmī, sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, sotāpanno, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, gotrabhū – ime kho, bhikkhave, nava puggalā āhuneyyā … pe … anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā"ti.
an9.10:2: Sambodhi nissayo ceva,Meghiya nandakaṁ balaṁ;Sevanā sutavā sajjho,Puggalo āhuneyyena cāti.
